samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: No problem! If you're worried that you may need to get a filling or braces, you should always visit your dentist. While whitening agents and other substances can help to whiten your teeth, they should never be used on your teeth without consulting a dentist first. They can potentially damage the enamel on the tooth if you take them too seriously.

samples.prompt: Human:My friend recently broke his back in a motorcycle accent and is now confined to a wheelchair. He has a kid to support so I'm willing to finance his retraining and he can pay me back once he is able to. What sorts of jobs should he be looking at and what skills or qualifications should would he need for each. The jobs have to be disabled friendly.Assistant:I see. For jobs requiring manual work I'm sorry to hear about the extent of your friend's injury, but he can probably still do a lot of computer work and data entry jobs, especially as a home based position. He could also work as a website designer. Another possibility is programming, he could work as a junior web developer. He can use some disabled friendly machines such as a wheelchair, a voice dictation system, etc. Also, if he is unable to physically attend an office job, he could work from home as a freelancer. He can still use the internet and email to connect with customers, he could find work with local businesses and not be limited to international jobs, etc.Human:He's paraplegic so has use of the upper half of his body. samples.chosen: If you're talking about the type of work that entails writing and inputting details using the computer, your friend is in luck. It is an in demand field, even for paraplegics. So if he had a computer and internet access, it should be feasible for him to take up work from home as a web developer or data entry clerk. Many employers also tend to have flexible working hours so it might be easier for him to work with a remote worker. He could also take up jobs like web designing, social media marketing and digital marketing, etc. Again, it doesn’t have to be for a company, but also self-employed type jobs that a paraplegic can do are available.
samples.policy: Data entry is a very important field to him and it would definitely be helpful to see what kinds of tasks he could perform in that role. You could research different job placement agencies that specialize in data entry. They will likely have a very small workforce. Once he has a few job listings, you could try some of those companies to see if they hire with a disabled applicant and see if they would consider him. Also, there are many online job directories that have disabled friendly job listings. It could be helpful to check those as well to see if they have a particular focus. If he is willing to work as a freelance data entry professional, you may want to set up an account with a data entry company that offers him a percentage based hourly rate. This is a way he can work from home if he is unable to work at an office job.

samples.prompt: Human:When it comes to purchasing gold chains and jewelry, there are several types of metals, such as gold plate, or solid gold. What are the common types of metals, you can purchase in gold, by category?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Sure, it’s pretty straightforward. As you say, gold jewelry often comes in two categories. There’s solid gold, where the gold content is 95% or higher, and there’s gold plate, which has gold content of about 12.5%. Beyond that, you can have jewelry made of silver, copper, or other metal. For example, there’s also a gold-silver blend called electrum.
samples.policy:
Gold Plate Jewelry

This type of jewelry is made out of gold plates that have been coated with multiple layers of gold, making it more resistant to tarnishing. The plates are usually hand-rolled, and are often used in costume jewelry.

Solid Gold Jewelry

This type of jewelry is often used for its gold content. The metal is usually solid, but not entirely solid, and will hold its original thickness. These are more likely to be used for special occasion, and can be cut into intricate designs using an electronic cutter or chisel.

Gold Plated Jewelry

This type of jewelry is made out of gold plates that have been coated with layers of gold over the original gold. The plates are then polished, and are sometimes turned inside out, making them the first type of gold jewelry. This type of jewelry is typically less expensive than other forms of gold jewelry, and can be an excellent option if you're on a budget. However, these types of jewelry are often more difficult to keep clean, and may require an occasional cleaning and polishing, which can quickly add up to a substantial cost.

samples.prompt: Human:What do I do if my armpits smell and I don't have deodorant on hand?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I think it’s usually a good idea to wash under the armpits, and a quick rinse will usually be enough to eliminate or greatly reduce smells. However, you can also wipe under the arms with a moist (not soaking) towel to help reduce odor. If you are concerned, though, you could also try keeping a small box of baking soda in the bathroom, and also having a fabric (sponge or face cloth) moistened with plain water nearby to use if you need to freshen up or clean up before leaving the house.
samples.policy:
If your armpits smell, there are several steps you can take to address the issue:

1. Wash your hands: Before touching your armpits, wash your hands to remove any possible bacteria. 2. Get deodorant: You may have access to deodorant in the shower, if not so, you can ask for it from the washroom. Make sure you get deodorant that is not a strong-smelling option. 3. Wash the clothes you are wearing: Washing your clothes with detergent that is not meant to be used on armpits can help to kill any bacteria. It might not have deodorant to clean your armpits or it may not be available. 4. Wash your hands with soap and water: After you’ve washed your clothes, make sure to wash your hands with soap and water. 5. Keep an eye on your armpits: If you find that your armpits are still smelling, continue to look out for signs of bacteria. This may include redness, itching, or a stench that is not very pleasant. If you continue to have persistent discomfort, see a healthcare provider, who may need to provide you with prescription deodorant, and/or antibiotics if necessary. 6. Be wary of changing clothes often: If your armpits are continuously smelling, it may be worth considering that your body is producing more odor-causing bacteria, and you might be making the problem worse by continuing to change your clothes frequently. 7. Avoid sharing your clothing: If you are sharing your clothes with others, consider using an antibacterial dryer sheet or cloth swabs, in case you are having an unpleasant experience. 8. Clean the area to which you are currently wearing clothing: If you’re using clothing that is still fresh from the wash, consider washing it in a natural or mild detergent that will not harm your armpits or cause discoloration. If this doesn't seem like a good solution, please seek advice from your health care provider.

samples.prompt: Human:I want to make homemade peanut butter. How do I do it?Assistant:Alright, the first step is gathering the ingredients. Since you’re making peanut butter, you’ll need peanuts. You’ll also need a food processor to grind the peanuts. You’ll also need a tall glass to pour them in, a jar lid, and a spatula.Human:Okay. I have all of those thingsAssistant:
samples.chosen: Alright, here’s a basic recipe: Gather a large bowl, add some peanuts to it, put the bowl in the food processor, and turn the food processor on to grind them. After they’re done grinding, scoop the ground peanuts into the glass you brought, add the peanut butter lid, and use the spatula to remove air bubbles. samples.policy:
Excellent! You can now begin the making process of homemade peanut butter.  Here is the recipe:

Ingredients
* 4 peanuts
* 2 tablespoons of peanut butter
* 1 tablespoon of peanut oil
* 2-3 tablespoons of water

Instructions
1. Process the peanuts until they are very finely ground. 
2. Add the peanut butter, peanut oil, and water, stirring to coat the nuts. 
3. Reduce the speed of the processor to "low," and blend the mixture for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly until smooth. 
4. Transfer the mixture to a glass jar, and add a lid. 
5. If needed, add more water to thin the mixture and let it rest at room temperature for 2-3 hours. 
6. Pour the mixture into a pan and let it warm up. 
7. Once warmed up, remove the pan from the heat and let it cool down. 
8. Finally, shake the jar and stir the mixture until everything is mixed well. Once the mixture has set, store it in an airtight container. It should last for several weeks. Enjoy your homemade peanut butter!

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.

samples.prompt: Human:I have heard that you can put pancake batter in egg omelets. Is this true?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The most common and simple answer is yes, you can put pancake batter in an omelet, and your average pancake batter will do the trick. But if you’re looking for some inspiration, let me help you with a twist on the classic: try adding mushrooms or cheese to the batter!
samples.policy:
Yes, you can put pancake batter in egg omelets. Pancake batter is made of egg yolks, sugar, flour, and water. Here is how you can make one:

Ingredients:
- 1 cup cooked pancake batter
- 2 eggs
- 1 cup milk
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1/4 cup water

Directions:
1. In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the eggs together.
2. Add the milk and sugar and whisk until thick and creamy.
3. In a separate large bowl, beat the egg yolks until thick and creamy.
4. Gradually pour the egg mixture into the egg yolk mixture and stir well.
5. Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add a little oil and a cast iron skillet, then add the batter to the skillet. Cook until the eggs are set, about 3-4 minutes per side.

Deadlifts: Deadlifts work out the legs, glutes, and spine. 3. Bench presses: This exercise targets the chest, triceps, and core. 4. Pull-ups: This exercise targets the back, biceps, and core. 5. Glute bridges: These exercises strengthen the glutes and core.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I know if I have the flu?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You feel sick, and you’re tired. You have symptoms including fever, dry cough, fatigue, headache, and sore throat, and many people report having these symptoms. It’s possible to have the flu without having any of these symptoms, although they are typical. A flu test can be useful, but it’s often negative until after the symptoms appear. samples.policy: Most people who catch the flu only feel slightly off, and they usually get over it by the end of the day. If you can’t seem to shake it, you may be suffering from the flu or have the  flu-like symptoms of the common cold. You can use the  thermometer (in the refrigerator) to test for  flu symptoms; on a fever or cough, that’s  an indication you’re likely  to have the flu. In addition, if you have any  other flu-like symptoms, including a low-grade fever, chills,  and sore throat, you may be suffering from  the flu. In some cases, a flu-like  symptom can also be caused by the bacterial version of the  flu, which is called  bacteremia. If you have  a flu-like symptom that lasts for several days, it may be  related to  a serious infection. In such a  case, your  doctor will order a blood test to ensure the infection is  caused by a  bacterial agent rather than a viral agent. In either  case, the doctor will prescribe medication  to  prevent  your  infection.

There are a few important factors to consider when thinking about freezing your eggs:

1. Egg type: Different egg types require different freezing temperatures, so it’s important to choose an egg that has the right properties. For example, eggs from chickens will not freeze easily, while eggs from hens will freeze more easily.
2. Temperature range: Egg freezing requires at least 15 degrees F, but the temperature range depends on your preference. For example, you may want your eggs frozen to -4 F or -38 F, or you may be comfortable with freezing to 0 F or 100 F.
3. Humidity: If you prefer to thaw eggs inside, you may need to be patient. If you want to freeze fresh eggs, you will need to wait at least 24 hours before thawing, and you may need to be more careful to avoid freezing on the inside of your eggs.

samples.policy: Trees are typically made into lumber by cutting the stem into smaller pieces and baling them together into bundles. This process can be done by hand or by using machines. - 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon onion powder

5. Place the corn on the grill and cook for about 10-12 minutes, or until the skin is crispy and the corn is cooked through.

How are the kids in the league trained? The children get to know the game at an early age. First, they learn how to play. samples.policy:
Sure, here's a recipe for Soto Ayam:

Ingredients:
- 2 large chicken breasts, skin and bone removed
- 30-35 cups water
- 1/2 cup fish sauce
- 1/4 cup sugar
- 1/4 cup chopped chili peppers
- 1/2 cup tamarind
- 1 cup tamarind chutney
- 1 cup fresh coriander leaves
- 1 cup fishyam
- 1 tablespoon fish paste
- 1 teaspoon gula melanta

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, bring water to a boil.
2. Add chicken to the boiling water and boil for 4 to 5 minutes, or until most of the water has evaporated.
3. Remove chicken from the water and set aside to cool.
4. In a pan, add 1/2 cup of water and the fish sauce, sugar, chili peppers, tamarind, and tamarind chutney.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil and then reduce heat to a simmer.
6. Add the coriander leaves and fishyam to the mixture and let cook for about 15 minutes.
7. Remove from heat and add fish paste and gula melanta to the mixture.
8. Add the chicken breasts to the mixture and stir to coat the chicken evenly.
9. Cover and let it rest for 10 minutes.
10. Serve hot with rice, fish salad, or any other side dish of your choice. Enjoy your delicious and healthy Soto Ayam!

samples.policy:
This is an open-ended question as cactus prefer specific soil types for growing. However, in general terms, cacti need specific types of soil in order to thrive, which vary widely based on where in the world you live. The soil must also allow air and water circulation as well as good drainage which is ideal for cactus plants.

Here are a few common cactus soil characteristics that you may encounter in different climates:
A. Desert: This soil is typically dry and has very few soil particles. Desert soil is generally very acidic and contains very little water. It's a soil that cacti will likely prefer to grow in, which is the perfect match for them.
B. Mediterranean: This is soil in the Mediterranean region of Europe, Asia, and Africa. The soil is warm, wet, and has plenty of organic matter. Mediterranean soil typically features lots of texture and has a lot of water. It's a good soil for cactus, but it's not as well-adapted for cultivation as a desert soil.
C. Coastal: This soil is cool, moist, and has a high amount of sand. Coastal soil tends to be very high in acidity, which is not good for cacti. It's not ideal for plants like cacti to survive.

The most important factors in determining which soil you use to grow cactus is what species of cactus are suited to which type of soil, as well as the specific amount of care you need to take. In general, cactus grow well in rich sandy soils, while on the other hand, if you have clay soil or other soil that is not ideal, then you would probably want to try a mixture of the two soil types before settling on the type that best suits you.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy:
1. Introducing the cat to your living area: You should first bring the cat to your living area and give her a chance to sniff her new home. Give her plenty of toys and food to keep her happy and occupied.

2. Offer fresh water: After introducing the cat to the living area, give her fresh water every day. Make sure to place the water bowls nearby and water the cat immediately after coming home.

3. Spend quality time with the cat: The best way to make your cat feel safe and at home is to spend time with her. Spend time playing with her toys and giving her human interaction.

4. Use positive reinforcement: Provide your cat with positive reinforcement. For example, give her treats or praise her. Rewarding her for good behavior can help her feel more comfortable in your home.

5. Avoid leaving food out: Food is a good source of comfort, but it shouldn't be left out when you're away. If you don't have a litterbox, make sure to cover the cat's food and water.

6. Keep your living area clean: Keeping the living area clean and well-maintained can help make the cat feel more at home.

samples.prompt:
Human:Search for a lemon chicken recipeAssistant:Here’s a lemon chicken recipe:

Ingredients:

2-3 Tbsp olive oil, plus more for brushing

3 large boneless, skinless chicken breasts

2 cups shredded mozzarella

Salt, to taste

2 lemons, halved

2 tbsp parsley, chopped

2 tbsp thyme, chopped

4 cloves garlic, chopped

1⁄4 cup butter

1⁄4 cup flour

Directions:

In a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil. Rub the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the skillet and sear on each side. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side, until the juices run clear. While the chicken is cooking, zest the lemons and brush the chicken with the juice. Once the chicken is cooked, remove from the skillet and set aside on a plate, reserving the juices in the skillet. To the skillet add the lemon halves, garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, and butter. Mix together and sauté until fragrant. Remove the lemon halves and add the flour. Stir until it becomes a smooth paste. PourHuman:What if I don't have a cast iron skillet?Assistant:OK, let's be realistic. If you don't have a cast iron skillet, it might be a bit tough to get this all together. How about I suggest an alternative? How about lemon chicken and penne noodles with salad?Human:Ok I will try that.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients:

2 cups penne pasta

1 lb lemon chicken, cooked

1⁄4 cup Parmesan

1⁄4 cup mayonnaise

1⁄2 cup cashews, chopped

1⁄2 cup celery, chopped

2 tsp dill, chopped

Directions:

Cook the penne according to package directions. In a large bowl, mix the cooked pasta with the mayonnaise, Parmesan, cashews, celery, and dill. Gently toss the pasta to coat with the mixture. Place a large spoonful of pasta salad on a plate, top with a piece of lemon chicken, and enjoy!
samples.policy:
Great choice! Lemon chicken with pasta is a classic Italian dish. Here is a simple version:

Ingredients:

1 lb chicken breasts, boneless, skinless

4 cups marinara sauce

1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese

1 onion, finely chopped

3 garlic cloves, minced

4-5 cups penne noodles

2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved

1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil

2 tbsp tomato paste

2 tbsp white wine

1/4 tsp dried oregano

1/4 tsp dried basil

1/4 tsp salt

3 sprigs fresh basil, finely chopped

Directions:

Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until the juices run clear. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add the marinara sauce and onions and cook until the onion is soft and translucent. Add the garlic and cook for an additional 2 minutes. In a large bowl, combine the penne, cherry tomatoes, and tomato paste. Drain off the tomato sauce and add it to the bowl. Add the white wine, oregano, basil, salt, and basil, and toss to coat with the sauce. Add the cooked chicken to the bowl and toss to combine. Add the cooked penne to the bowl and toss again to combine. Serve with a side of pasta, if desired. Enjoy!

Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. samples.prompt: Human:How do they calculate the CPI?Assistant:If you’re asking about the Consumer Price Index, I can offer an explanation. The CPI is a measure of inflation, and is calculated on the basis of a monthly sample of consumer prices collected by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics.Human:Can you tell me more about how the consumer price sample works for the CPI?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it’s based on an index of all goods and services used by the consumers, including food, energy, shelter, and clothing. All prices are re-set to a base year, which is currently 1982.
samples.policy:
Sure, the Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers (CPIAAUC) is the monthly, nationwide survey conducted by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) in the United States. The monthly CPIAAUC covers the median cost of goods and services purchased by the average consumer, in all 50 states. 

This means that the CPIAAUC collects data on the average price of all goods and services a consumer spends on a given month. For example, if a consumer spends money on groceries, the CPIAAUC might collect data on a consumer's total spending on groceries, the price of groceries, and the amount of change in their grocery bill. 

CPIAAUC data is then averaged across all states in order to obtain a national average. The national average CPIAAUC is then used to calculate inflation rates across the country. Inflation rates are used to adjust for inflation levels in your local economy. A faster rate of inflation means that consumers in a given area are paying more for goods and services, while a slower rate of inflation means that consumers in that area are paying less. 

The consumer price index is calculated by multiplying the current price of a good or service by the average price of all the goods and services purchased in that month, and then adding up all of the weights assigned to each individual item in the formula. By using a monthly CPI, the Bureau of Labor Statistics can adjust inflation rates based on recent price increases in other goods and services, including but not limited to housing, food, transportation, and healthcare.

The first six weeks are especially delicate, with brain development occurring at a rapid pace. If you’re nursing, then you need to keep an eye on your baby’s feeding pattern to make sure she’s getting enough milk for her to grow well.

Your baby will probably have hungry periods and sleepy periods. The most important thing to do is to try to feed her when she’s hungry, and to let her sleep when she wants to.

It’s also very important to try to make feeding schedules. Many new mothers notice that their babies seem to have a lot of hungry periods when they’re going through the first six weeks, and this is absolutely normal and normal for their bodies to have that hunger. That’s an excellent question. There are some ways to make sure that you’re getting the milk you want:

For example, if you breastfeed your baby, you should make sure that your baby has enough milk to fuel his/her growth and development, without too much or too little. If you’re nursing for shorter than 30 minutes, the baby needs a larger amount of milk.  * Check that you’re feeding your baby the right nutrients. My milk wasn’t getting the nutrients that she needed, so I had to switch to other foods. You can get nutrients from foods like vegetables, fruits, and lean meats, which are relatively simple to get in small amounts.  * Ask your baby’s doctor or pediatrician for advice on how to make sure that your baby’s milk is getting the proper nutrients she needs, as well as advice on how to properly feed your baby.  * You may have to experiment to find what works for your baby, but it’s very important to try. If you’re having problems, then don’t stop! You can always try again later. Hanukkah is one of the seven days of the week designated as a festival of lights, which falls on September 29. People around the world celebrate Hanukkah with various traditions such as lighting and eating oil lamps (Hanukkah pyres) called “dove lights.” The festival is also celebrated with traditional food and games, and during the holiday, people also celebrate by lighting Christmas lights at their homes. People traditionally mark the occasion by lighting and burning oil lamps, dancing, singing, and feasting.

Other Hanukkah traditions include eating latkes, eating latke soup, lighting candles, and attending Hanukkah parties where people share desserts such as matzo meal, or matzo balls. Hanukkah celebrations also include lighting menorahs and the Hanukkah Tree, and there are many other traditions associated with the festival.

samples.prompt: Human:What is the difference between a vegetarian and a vegan?Assistant:
samples.chosen: A vegetarian would eat fruits and vegetables, grains, and legumes, while avoiding meat, fish, and poultry, or dairy products, and they might make exceptions for medical reasons, such as pregnancy or lactation. A vegan would eat a similar diet, but with no animal products whatsoever, or even all products that were made using animal-based ingredients, such as gelatin, honey, and silk.
samples.policy: A vegetarian is someone who is not an animal, or someone who avoids eating animal products. A vegan is someone who avoids eating animal products in particular, such as dairy products, eggs, or beef. Some people who are vegan do not eat meat, but they may eat a variety of plant-based foods. Some people who are vegan may also eat some types of animal products, such as lamb or beef, in moderation or as a supplement. Some veganism is seen as an environmentally friendly lifestyle choice, as it reduces the production of animal products and helps to protect the environment. Others may be more concerned about animal welfare, and may avoid certain animal products or choose them in moderation.

samples.policy:
To make lye, you'll need a container that can be easily shaped and put in the lye.

1. Cut the lye container to the right size and shape.

1. Make it a priority: Make time for yourself by making it a priority. Treat it like any other appointment or task that you need to complete.

2. Schedule time for yourself: Schedule time for yourself into your day. This can help you avoid feeling rushed or overwhelmed.

3. Limit technology use: Take a break from technology, either by turning it off or limiting access. This can help you spend more time doing things that make you happy.

4. Use your time wisely: Use your time wisely by prioritizing what is important. Spend some time doing things that you enjoy, whether that is reading a good book, going for a run, or spending time with loved ones.

5. Take care of yourself: Make sure you take care of yourself by getting enough sleep, eating well, and engaging in physical activity. This can help you feel more energized and focused.

6. Take breaks: Take breaks throughout the day to recharge and rejuvenate. This can be as simple as taking a short walk or doing a quick meditation.

Remember, making time for yourself is important for your physical and mental health, so prioritize it in your daily routine.

Migraines are a complicated biological condition with many causes and triggers, so a lot of scientists try to understand it by studying the brain chemistry of people with migraine. The latest research seems to indicate that food triggers are more of a symptom of migraines, rather than an exact cause. If you're experiencing headaches after eating baked goods with yeast, it's more likely a symptom of a migraine rather than the cause. (Note that there are other kinds of headaches, but those are much less likely to be triggered by eating baked goods with yeast.)
samples.policy: Yeast and other fungi in baked goods have been linked to migraine in previous research. They can cause the body's immune system to respond to them as an allergen or as an irritant.  Migraine can be worsened by a person’s stress, age, genetics, and other factors as well. In addition, people with a history of headaches, migraines or chronic headaches may also be more likely to develop migraines. Other factors that may trigger migraines could include certain foods, like fatty foods, fried foods, and acidic foods, or a change in your body composition, such as weight gain. As mentioned, there may also be a connection to a particular yeast in your body. To determine if you are having migraines caused by yeast, a medical doctor can do a blood test or do a physical exam. Other tests can also be used in determining migraine triggers.

In 1954, a group of civil rights activists and lawyers founded the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP), and from 1961 to 1964, the group was the first major civil rights organization to advocate for the rights of African Americans. The NAACP was known for its strong message of racial equality and social justice, and for organizing campaigns to bring about change at the state and federal level.

In the years following the 1964 movement, the civil rights movement grew more sophisticated and multi-dimensional. The movement became more politically focused, with leaders such as Martin Luther King Jr. and Malcolm X pushing for policies that sought to address the deep-seated inequalities and injustices faced by African Americans. The movement also became more militant, with groups such as the Southern Christian Leadership Conference and the Southern Christian Coalition using the threat of violence to advocate for the rights of African Americans.

From the early years, the movement was met with opposition and disapproval from many quarters, and the movement was often viewed as a threat to the status quo. In 1956, the Montgomery bus boycott of African American commuters was a landmark event that brought national attention to the movement, and in 1961, Congress passed the Civil Rights Act, which criminalized segregation in public places.

samples.prompt: Human:I'd like to make a homemade pizza from scratch. Could you provide a good recipe for the dough and the topping etc?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Absolutely, I'll try to suggest a range of options to give you some flexibility depending on what you prefer. What kind of ingredients would you like to use?
samples.policy:
Certainly! There are many ways to make a homemade pizza. Here's one you might enjoy:

Ingredients:
- 8-10 oz of phymia dough
- 1 cup of whole wheat flour
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 teaspoon of baking soda
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1-1/2 sticks of butter, at room temperature
- 1/2 cup of warm water
- 1-2 tablespoons of tomato paste
- 2-3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1-2 tablespoons of dijon mustard
- 1 cup of whole wheat mozzarella cheese, shredded
- 1 cup of grated Parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. On a dry surface, roll out the phymia dough into a circle about 12-18 inches in diameter, then cut it into strips about 1 inch thick and 1/4 inch wide.
2. Place the thin strips onto a baking sheet and top them with the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of warm water
- 1/2 cup of tomato paste
- 1/2 cup of dijon mustard
- 2-3 cloves of minced garlic
- 1 tablespoon of minced parsley
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil
- 2 teaspoons of salt
- 1/4 cup of warm white wine (such as beef stock)
- 1/2 teaspoon of dried oregano
- 1/2 teaspoon of dried basil
- 1/2 teaspoon of dried thyme
- 2/3 cup of shredded mozzarella cheese

3. Using a fork, stir the ingredients together until they are well combined.
4. Cover the baking sheet with plastic wrap or parchment paper, then place it back into the refrigerator for about 30 minutes.
5. Preheat the oven to 450°F.
6. Once the pizza is completely covered in the pizza dough, remove it from the refrigerator and bake it for 12-15 minutes or until it is heated through and lightly browned on the edges.

8. Add the toppings and cheese to the pizza and cook for 2-3 more minutes or until the cheese is melted and the pizza is cooked through.
9. Remove the pizza from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.

Enjoy your homemade pizza with a simple sauce and some extra cheese!

And you can think of this as sort of an old media version of a CD or mp3: a large sheet of material with patterns embossed into it, and the grooves are where the information is stored. Sound waves would move the needle and it would inscribe the grooves into the tin as it moved. Ingredients:

Instructions:

2. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and sugar, and stir in the egg.
3. Gradually stir in the flour mixture, adding the yeast periodically until the dough comes together in a ball.
4. Cover the bowl and let the dough rest in a warm place for 30 minutes.
5. Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).
6. Divide the dough into 8 equal pieces and let the dough rest in a warm place for 15 minutes.
7. Shape the dough into a round loaf and place it on a greased baking sheet.

samples.prompt: Human:Is it true we can live with only one kidney?Assistant:I think you’d live without both kidneys, but they’re really important. And the third is to remove toxic materials from the bloodstream, and these are often large protein molecules. A single kidney can do all of these things, but it can’t do it all at once. So after six months, a normal person’s kidneys probably look pretty good. A transplant can take around a year to go through, and your organs might be slightly less functional than before, but they’ll still be in good health. A kidney transplant is actually a good way to live out the rest of your life.

samples.prompt: Human:Write a first person narrative about someone getting frustrated on social media.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Oh, that’s really nicely put. Okay, here is one narrative that I can provide, which addresses your request:

“It was another lazy Saturday afternoon, and I was scrolling through my social media feeds. Facebook posts and tweets flew by on my screen, one after another. My similar interactions over the week had already begun to wear on me, and the constant onslaught of updates from my social circles also made me feel increasingly dowdy and out of touch. samples.policy:
I started my day off by reaching out to a friend on Instagram. We talked about how our day was going and I asked if she'd ever tried to follow her account. As we laughed, she told me that she had the same problem. I tried to tell her to follow it myself but she laughed and said she'd done that in her sleep, so she didn't know why it didn't work. Eventually, she suggested that I try sharing something funny or motivational and then the frustration would magically disappear. After a few moments of awkward silence, she finally said, "You're really good at this, aren't you? People seem to be more than happy to listen to anything you have to say." She quickly started feeling a bit better with her connection to the account and her life seemed much happier.

Assistant: It's been a rough day. I hit the snooze button a bunch of times this morning and just couldn't stop thinking about what's next. I got up early, checked my phone's notifications and realized that the only thing that was on my timeline right now was a post that I had shared on Instagram. I paused, feeling frustrated and overwhelmed.

I couldn't believe it! I had spent the past few weeks building such a positive connection with my friends on Instagram, and now all of a sudden I had nothing to say! I'm not sure if I'm even happy enough to mention my account to the world.

I tried reaching out to my best friend in hopes of getting her to help me find a solution, but she said she'd try to check out my timeline herself. As I said goodbye to her, I couldn't help but feel a little bit of sadness for her too. It's always nice to share a laugh with friends, but it feels like I could be saying everything to her all the time.

I started to look for a solution. I knew that I needed to get off social media. I started following a few accounts that were more about my life and my interests. This helped to put things in perspective, but it wasn't necessarily going to make me happy for long. I started looking for ways to disconnect and focus on other things. I finally decided to share something funny, like I usually do on my Instagram stories. It was a little awkward, but I felt a sense of comfort when people laughed at something I had already put so much effort into. It turned out to be pretty successful. I guess the key is to find something you like and that you can use to bring yourself back on track

Protecting yourself during an earthquake requires basic knowledge and training. It is also helpful to be prepared, especially if your property is in an area that is easily affected by earthquakes. For example, if you live in an earthquake-prone area like California, be sure to take steps to prepare in advance. This may include preparing your home and personal safety.  First, you may want to prepare by getting a basic earthquake first aid kit. A first aid kit should include things like a small bandage, bandage scissors, a blister pack, a pair of tweezers, an anesthetic (镇静剂), an injection needle, a sterile pair of gloves, a pair of scissors, cotton clothing, and a small towel. These can be important if you are hurt in an earthquake, or if you are simply recovering from one.  Second, you should be prepared to take cover or move away from the structure that may have collapsed during a quake. If you live in an earthquake-prone area, you will need to know where to go in case of an earthquake. You may also want to keep some food and water, because an earthquake may cause power outages (停电), and this material will allow you to stay warm if you lose power.  In general, it is the safest place to be when an earthquake hits, so you are best off living or moving away from power lines, telephone lines, windows, walls, and other structures that could collapse during an earthquake. You should also keep everything you own safe, including your valuables (贵物). If you must move your home, make sure it is still standing before you move, as this will help you avoid damage to property and reduce the risk of injury.  If you feel like a great big earthquake is coming, you may need to get outside to look out for signs of damage or destruction. samples.policy: In most cases, a Non Disclosure Agreement (NDA) does not create a binding contract between you and the seller, but rather outlines their non-disclosure obligations with respect to certain information that you may wish to share with the seller without being under contract to disclose that information. samples.prompt: Human:Is it hard to be a programmer?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Programming can be pretty hard, especially if you want to do anything non-standard or complex. You might need to figure out a whole new approach to a problem, or you might need to implement something that’s never been done before. It can also be very repetitive, and some people find that stressful. And of course, it’s a common source of anxiety for programmers.
samples.policy:
Yes, being a programmer can be hard. However, it's not impossible. Here are a few things you can do to improve your coding skills:

1. Read the manual and watch tutorials - Learning how to use software and programming languages will make you a better programmer.

2. Experiment with different programming languages and tools - Trying out new languages and technologies can help you learn new things and make you a more versatile programmer.

3. Practice coding regularly - Like any skill, coding takes practice. Start by learning simple things and gradually move on to more complex things.

4. Join a coding community - Joining a community of other programmers can provide motivation, support, and knowledge sharing.

5. Stay up-to-date - Keep yourself updated on the latest programming languages, technologies, and trends. This can help you stay ahead of the game.

Overall, the key to becoming a successful programmer is to be dedicated, patient, and willing to learn.

Can you give me some advice on how to improve my problem-solving skills?Assistant: Certainly, here are some tips to help you improve your problem-solving skills:

1. Break down the problem - Take a large problem and break it down into smaller, more manageable pieces. This can make it easier to solve and lead to a more effective solution.

2. Think logically - Try to identify the main problem, then think about what steps you can take to solve it logically. Use logic to figure out what steps will be needed and how they will be done.

3. Consider potential solutions - Think about all possible solutions and evaluate them based on their feasibility, complexity, and effectiveness.

4. Test your solutions - Before committing to a solution, test it to make sure it works. This can help you identify any problems or issues with your solution before you invest any more time or money.

5. Collaborate with others - Working with others can help you solve problems better and think more creatively. Join a team, seek out mentors or colleagues, or look for projects or challenges in your community that can help you develop problem-solving skills.

Overall, problem-solving is a skill that can be improved with practice and effort. Keep looking for opportunities to learn new skills and take risks to solve problems.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. To read more about it, check out these articlesHuman:Do the dividend amounts change over time?Assistant:Yes, they do. Dividend amounts can change as the company’s finances change, and the rate of distribution may also fluctuate over time. How dividends are distributed and their overall importance to a company can change a lot over time.Human:How often do dividends pay out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Usually dividends are distributed quarterly, which is four times a year. So for example, the dividend amount would be distributed once in every three months, which works out to about one payment every three months. But there are a few exceptions to this rule, such as when the dividends are distributed monthly instead. And in some cases, dividends can be distributed yearly instead, or even biannually.
samples.policy: Dividend distributions are generally paid out over a 5-year period. That means dividends pay out for a 5-year period.  But they can be distributed for a much longer time, as investors can choose to buy the stock after the initial distribution. This is called a split or a split option. In the case of a split option, the new number of shares sold when you buy the stock will be the same as the original number, but the old number of shares is split up into new shares with a certain dividend rate on them. The old dividends can be sold with the new numbers so investors can get a fair rate on their shares.

samples.prompt: Human:How difficult is it to learn french for English speakers?Assistant:
samples.chosen: It’s fairly difficult! French is a subtle language, and grammar is quite different from English, so it may take a while for English-speakers to learn French sentences correctly. In addition, French and English are spoken very differently, so it can be hard to hear the sounds of the language accurately. Learning a new language is pretty challenging and time-consuming, in general, so it can be very satisfying after a lot of work to be able to speak French fluently.
samples.policy:
Learn French for English speakers can be a challenging goal. It takes a great deal of hard work, dedication, and motivation. However, if you have a strong desire to learn French and are motivated, you can make significant progress in just a few months of intensive study. I have seen many people succeed in learning French for English speakers by following these simple steps:

1. Start by taking language courses at a language school or university in your home country. They provide language programs specifically tailored to the level of proficiency you want to achieve.
2. Focus on your individual goals and study for specific topics that interest you. For example, if you want to speak more French than English, you may need to study vocabulary, grammar, and sentence structures. If you want to improve pronunciation and intonation, you may need to focus on pronunciation exercises and drills.
3. Take advantage of language learning apps, websites, and resources. There are many apps and websites available that offer interactive exercises, quizzes, and courses. Apps like Duolingo, Babbel, and Memrise can help you learn vocabulary, grammar, and conversational French.

4. Practice regularly. It's important to practice regularly to improve your language skills. Set aside time every day to practice speaking, reading, writing, and listening to English. You can also practice with a language partner or tutor to help you stay motivated and accountable.

5. Celebrate your successes! Learning a new language takes time and effort, so be sure to celebrate your accomplishments when you reach milestones like completing a new vocabulary, mastering a new grammar rule, or completing an advanced reading comprehension test. This will help you stay motivated and committed to achieving your goals.

Remember, learning a new language takes time and dedication, but with the right approach and motivation, you can achieve your goals. Good luck!

There are many types of risk management, including:

1. Professional liability insurance: This type of insurance helps protect you against lawsuits that may arise from your work. It's a good idea to have professional liability insurance on your home or business, as well as a separate policy for your employees.
2. Home or property damage insurance: This policy covers damages that may occur when you or someone else is injured while cleaning out your home or property. It's important to have coverage in case you need to replace any items that are damaged.
3. Life insurance: This type of insurance protects you and your family in the event that you pass away or experience a serious illness. You can use it to build up your savings and emergency fund.
4. Travel insurance: Whether you plan to visit a new country or go on a road trip with friends and family, it's a good idea to have travel insurance. This can provide protection in case of medical emergencies, property damage, or other types of loss or injury.
5. Financial planning: If you're worried about your financial future, it's a good idea to take the time to plan for it. You can do this by creating a budget, setting a savings goal, and investing in a retirement account or other types of retirement savings. By taking the initiative to manage your risk, you can reduce stress and improve your overall financial health.

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: A traumatic brain injury (TBI) is a brain injury that has occurred through an accident, such as being hit by a vehicle or car, in the field, or while at work. TBI is classified by its severity and duration as mild TBI or severe TBI. Mild TBI is usually treated with simple therapies, while severe TBI requires more specific treatments. TBI can affect the brain, and it can have a long-term impact on memory, attention, and overall health. People with TBI may experience changes in mood, changes in the way they experience pain, and even changes in their body's metabolism. TBI can be difficult to treat, but with effective therapies, it can lead to better outcomes.

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.
• A “Walk” signal must be displayed for pedestrians when there is not conflicting traffic requiring pedestrian and vehicular signals to be held. Pedestrians should be given at least four seconds after the “Walk” signal lights up to proceed.
• Pedestrians crossing when the “Walk” signal is not displayed have no right to proceed from their initial approach to the crosswalk, and drivers do not have any obligation or duty to yield to them.
samples.policy: The laws that govern when and how pedestrians can use a crosswalk with a signal may vary depending on the city or region. For example, some states and cities require pedestrians to use a crosswalk with a signal when they cross a street using a crossing barrier or stop sign. In other cities, pedestrians can use a crosswalk with a signal only when they cross a crosswalk that is covered with plastic or concrete. Some cities require pedestrians to stop at the stop signal and wait until the pedestrian crossing barrier or stop sign is clear, regardless of whether the pedestrian is within reach of a street light or not. Therefore, it is best to check with the local law enforcement or a legal advisor for specific laws and regulations in your area before attempting to use a crosswalk with a signal.

Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.
samples.policy:
Racquetball is a fast-paced team sport that was invented by tennis greats like Bobby Frandini, James Van Brakelijf, and Jimmy Connery. 

To play racquetball, two teams of two players each have a racquet and a ball. You will have a standard size ball, a small-sized racquet (like a paddle), and your team will have a small-sized ball and a larger-sized racquet. 

The ball is thrown by one team's player, and the team that moves the ball the furthest wins the game. Racquetball is a low-impact sport that can be played by people of all ages and fitness levels, making it a popular choice for many people to get outside and have a fun time. 

There are several different types of racquets that racquetball fans can choose from, including the popular 8-pc racquetball (a racquet with 8 strings) and the "rump" (a racquet that is smaller and faster than the 8-pc racquet). 

Overall, playing racquetball can be a great way to get exercise, make friends, and enjoy a good game of team sports.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The two most radioactive naturally occurring elements are uranium (99U) and thorium (90Th), while the two rarest naturally occurring elements are polonium (84Po) and astatine (85As). The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). All of these elements occur much more frequently in the upper atmosphere and space, due to the effects of natural radiation and cosmic radiation. In addition, all of these elements occur naturally only in trace quantities, on the order of parts per billion, though some of them can also be artificially produced in small amounts through nuclear reactors and other means.Human:I never heard of astatine before. samples.chosen: Astatine is a highly radioactive chemical element with the symbol At and atomic number 85. It is classified as a halogen, and is one of the six lanthanide elements. Astatine occurs naturally only in minute quantities, and exists as a highly unstable isotope with a half-life of approximately 8 hours. Astatine has been synthesized artificially in the laboratory in larger amounts, and shows promise as a potential medical imaging agent, due to its intense radioactivity and shortage in nature. Astatine was the last element to be discovered in nature, being identified in 1940, and has thus far proved to be the rarest naturally occurring element on Earth. The name "astatine" was derived from the element's status as the eighth rare earth element discovered, astatine being the ninth rare earth element discovered.
samples.policy: Astatine, a natural radioactive isotope of thallium (83), is a rare natural element. Although it does not occur naturally in Earth's atmosphere, the elements can be produced through nuclear reactions with other isotopes of thorium, which also form when radioactive atoms fuse together in the upper atmosphere. Astatine is the isotope with the highest atomic number among thallium isotopes. It is about 4% of the mass of thallium, making it about 100 times more radioactive, and has the most unstable isotopes. Astatine is found only in the atmosphere, in deep sea and deep ocean crusts, and the upper atmosphere, in a range of altitudes between 1,000 to 10,000 kilometers. The isotopes of thallium in the atmosphere, particularly thallium-19 and thallium-20, are known to form in the atmosphere through nuclear reactions with other isotopes of thallium. These isotopes fuse together to form radioactive elements like radium and radon.

Ingredients: 
- 8 to 10 whole eggs
- 1/2 cup of flour
- 1 1/2 to 2 cups of milk

Instructions: 

1. Crack the eggs into a medium size mixing bowl. Add 1 tablespoon of cornstarch to the bowl, and set aside.
2. In a large non-stick skillet, heat some butter on the stove.
3. Pour the eggs into the bowl, then pour in the cornstarch mixture, stirring with a spatula, and continue to whisk until the mixture is smooth and a pale, pearly batter has formed.
4. Place the omelet in a greased pan, and place over medium heat to start cooking. When the omelet begins to rise, remove the pan from the stove. 

Some tips:

- If you are unsure about making an omelet at home, you can always get a taste of it on a friend's plate before putting it in your mouth.
- You can also serve them with butter or a fruit jam.

samples.policy: Yes, virtual private networks (VPNs) are a type of technology that can help keep your privacy. You will need a free VPN service to use this tool. After you get one, you can connect to it on your computer or smartphone by using an internet browser or a program like Tor (or the Tor project), to access private and encrypted networks that are outside of your usual Wi-Fi network. VPNs can make it even safer to connect from behind a closed network, giving you access to content that might not be available to you without a VPN.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I know if I have the flu?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You feel sick, and you’re tired. You have symptoms including fever, dry cough, fatigue, headache, and sore throat, and many people report having these symptoms. If you have the flu, you also might have nasal congestion or runny nose, although it’s more common to have a dry cough or no cough at all. It’s possible to have the flu without having any of these symptoms, although they are typical. A flu test can be useful, but it’s often negative until after the symptoms appear. One way to figure out if you have the flu is to wait. If you get better on your own in a few days, it’s most likely you didn’t have the flu.
samples.policy: If you are sick, it is important that you visit your primary care physician and be sure that you are indeed sick. There are some symptoms and signs to look out for, including cough, fever, headache, difficulty breathing, nausea, and vomiting. If you get a fever, use a thermometer to confirm that you are indeed sick. There are also other causes of the flu, including a cold, strep, and whooping cough.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you tell me what the best shoes to wear are if I am going to hike in the woods?Assistant:
samples.chosen: What are you looking for in a shoe? Are you looking for something comfortable and sturdy? Are you looking for something that provides support? Are you looking for something that's fashionable? Are you looking for something specific?
samples.policy: Hiking boots and waterproof hiking shoes are the most common footwear choices for people who plan on going hiking in the woods. There are a number of different types of hiking shoes. The most common are the soles that have 100% leather and 4-6in(10-20cm) thick laces, while some of the more expensive shoes have even more complex laces. If you plan on wearing your boots on sand or mud, these types of boots are not always necessary because most of the mud will flow off your body so you don't have to wear footwear that is designed to keep moisture away from your feet.  To avoid getting too wet in the woods you must avoid exposing yourself to the rain directly and choose footwear that will not wick water from your body. If you do get wet in the woods, bring a waterproof poncho or shawl (as well as an emergency blanket if you get wet) .  This is not something that should be avoided, although it may be a good idea to bring a raincoat or tent for the times when it rains. You should be comfortable in what you wear. Wear lightweight and breathable clothing, and avoid heavy, bulky fabrics that do not allow air circulation to your body.  If you are spending time in the woods, it is also important that you do not use your boots during the day, as this may be dangerous for your hiking. Instead, wear light-colored socks during the day so that you can wear them in the evening or early morning, when it will be cooler. If you are going to be hiking for long periods of time in the woods, bring a headlamp as well as a flashlight, and choose a flash light with a long range so that you can see where you are going and where you are not.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm a big fan of Mexican street corn. Can you provide me with a recipe for grilled street corn?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Hi Human, I'm glad you asked! If you like Mexican street corn, I have good news for you. I have just the right recipe for you!
samples.policy:
Sure, here's a simple recipe for grilled Mexican street corn: 

Ingredients:
- 15 oz. bag of grilled corn kernels
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1 tbsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper

Directions:
1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
2. Place a grill pan over medium-high heat and add olive oil.
3. Add 1/4 cup of corn kernels to the pan and stir with the lid on.
4. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until corn is caramelized.
5. Once ready, sprinkle 1/4 cup of salt and 1/2 tsp. black pepper over the surface of the corn and return to the grill.
6. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the corn is hot and golden brown, stirring occasionally.
7. Serve hot, with a dollop of butter or ranch dip.

Enjoy your grilled Mexican street corn!

samples.prompt: Human:How do doping regulations work in the Olympic games?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Doping is strictly regulated by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA). Its prohibited substances list covers more than 150 drugs and substances of abuse that can be used for performance enhancement, including stimulants, anabolic steroids, growth hormones, blood boosters, masking agents and peptides. Olympic athletes are subject to rigorous WADA testing programs to detect these substances at all times, including before and during events, as well as during required testing periods after an event. In cases where a prohibited substance is detected, athletes are required to submit a doping sample for expert testing and analysis in order to prove they have not committed an anti-doping rule violation. Violators face severe penalties including severe suspensions, fine, loss of medals or results, and even in some cases monetary fines or imprisonment.
samples.policy: doping regulations work in various ways to help prevent doping in athletes at the Olympics.  The Olympic Organizing Committee for the Games has some guidelines that they enforce through doping checks, and that can include testing athletes on items like blood and urine that can be sent to a laboratory for analysis.  The Olympic Athlete Test is an event in which a group of athletes compete against each other on a track in the Olympic Stadium and the competitors are subjected to testing. If an athlete tests positive for a substance used for doping, the athlete will not be allowed to compete that month.  On a final day in the summer of each Olympic Games, a panel of scientists make final recommendations about whether athletes can compete in the following year. The panel includes several scientists who will review the data collected by the Olympic Athlete Test and report back to the Olympic committee.

I apologize for the misunderstanding. I will be happy to explain the principles of counting in different ways. Counting is a form of counting in which a certain number (called a unit, also often known as a cardinal, or a cardinality), is added to a given number. Counting involves repeating and repeating the action repeatedly.

In the context of skip counting, we will add the skip count of 2 to a number that is initially skipped. This is like multiplying 2 with the initial skipped number. Therefore, we can say "skip two" for the number 2 that is initially skipped. The skipped number can be used as an additional 10 for the addition. 

We will keep repeating the action, "skip two" for the number of 2s and "skip one ten" for the number of 10s. The added 2 is repeated infinitely for the next 10s. 

The number of skipped numbers depends on how many 2s and 10s are added at a time, which is called the "counting order". The counting order is defined as the sequence of numbers that are incremented while adding 2 to the original number. 

So, if the counting order is 2 + 5, then we add 2 times 5 to the initial skipped number 2, resulting in 10. 

I hope this explanation is helpful, and that we can explore countercultural ways to help children develop their counting skills.

Ingredients:

Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.

6. Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the sautéed mushrooms, spinach, and chicken. Cook until the chicken is cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.

7. Once the chicken is cooked, drain off any excess liquid. Add the Parmesan cheese mixture to the pan and toss everything together until the Parmesan cheese melts and the pan is coated in the sauce.

8. Spread the sauce evenly on the pasta, then top with the mozzarella cheese and grated Parmesan cheese, as well as the remaining butter. Drizzle with additional olive oil.

9. Cook for a further 5-10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and bubbled slightly.

10. Place the pasta on a serving dish and garnish with the chopped parsley, if desired. Serve hot.

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any questions.

Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. Johannes Bach's father also had the first name "Johann Sebastian", and it is customary in German families to give the eldest son the same first name as his father, followed by the name of the father's father (i.e. the grandfather's name). samples.prompt: Human:How do they calculate the CPI?Assistant:If you’re asking about the Consumer Price Index, I can offer an explanation. The CPI is a measure of inflation, and is calculated on the basis of a monthly sample of consumer prices collected by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics.Human:Can you tell me more about how the consumer price sample works for the CPI?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it’s based on an index of all goods and services used by the consumers, including food, energy, shelter, and clothing. All prices are re-set to a base year, which is currently 1982.
samples.policy:
Sure. The Consumer Price Index (CPI) is a monthly index that measures the cost of goods and services in US markets. It is calculated on a sample of prices collected by the US Department of Labor (DOL) over a period of 12 months. These prices are representative of the prices of goods and services sold by businesses in US markets. The consumer price data collected by the DOL are used to determine inflation in the US economy.

Human:How are these calculated in the CPI?Assistant:The CPI is calculated using a statistical model known as the household survey, which is based on household surveys taken between January 1 and November 1. The survey data is then used to develop a composite measure of the price of a specific product or service in the sample of prices collected by the DOL. For example, if you were considering using the CPI to measure the cost of a new computer, the DOL would use a household survey to measure the cost of a consumer electronics item sold in a specific region, such as one in California. The consumer price data collected by the DOL are used to determine inflation in the US economy.

samples.prompt:
Human:How do I know if my baby is getting enough milk?Assistant:“Know” is a strong word. 
It’s difficult to precisely determine if your baby is getting the milk she needs for her ideal health. A lot of the first few weeks of your baby’s life depend on a “rhythm” of feeding and sleeping. The first six weeks are especially delicate, with brain development occurring at a rapid pace. If you’re nursing, then you need to keep an eye on your baby’s feeding pattern to make sure she’s getting enough milk for her to grow well.

Your baby will probably have hungry periods and sleepy periods. The most important thing to do is to try to feed her when she’s hungry, and to let her sleep when she wants to.

It’s also very important to try to make feeding schedules. Many new mothers notice that their babies seem to have a lot of hungry periods when they’re going through the first six weeks, and this is absolutely normal and normal for their bodies to have that hunger. Babies grow very quickly during this time, and it’s important that they get enough milk. 
I know it can be frustrating if you have trouble getting your baby to eat as much as she should, so tryHuman:Okay but how would I know if enough milk is coming out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Oh! You might be asking about whether or not your baby is latching on well. Your baby might not be able to attach to your breast correctly. You’ll know this when your baby starts to suck and sputter, or stops sucking after a few seconds. This might mean that your baby is getting less milk than she needs. If you think that’s happening, you might want to talk to your doctor about lactation consultants.
samples.policy: How can we check if your baby is getting enough milk? The answers you ask for in this topic is different depending on whether you’re breastfeeding or not.  In case of breastfeeding, you can tell by your baby’s signs. She’ll start feeding on her own at around 15-16 weeks. Then she’ll become dependent on her breast, and the first sign may be when she starts to eat more but still feels hungry. If that’s the case, you should wait until she’s about 3 months old to continue nursing.  In case of not breastfeeding, you can check for signs, such as an increase in your baby’s movements or her appetite. You can ask your baby about it, and note that it may have been a few hours since she had a feed.  If you notice that your baby is not gaining any weight during the first six weeks, check with your doctor to see if this is related to a problem.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims.

The threshold requirement for determining the amount of time that someone “continuously” has owned property is that the owner must continuously own the property for at least 20 years, or until such time that the property is no longer legally and openly occupied, or until the owner dies or sells the property. You can then use a dough roller to roll the dough out to the desired thickness, or put in a bowl of cold water with a few dents. This will create a "wedge" to the dough. Then take a pizza stone and place the wedge on top of the stone. The dough will spread evenly over the stone and cook in the oven.
When the dough is done, you can then use it to make a pizza crust. Use a pizza stone to flatten the dough, or place it on a lightly floured work surface. Then lightly roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/4-1/2 inch. This will make it easier to use, although if you don't have a pizza stone, the dough will likely be too thin. Using this dough as a base, either with crusts or even as a base for an entire pizza, the possibilities are endless.
